infobtn.title: Properties
infobtn.description:
Properties can be bought through various quest. Each year, every property's value changes. It can go up, but also down. This means if you wait long enough you can sell your property and profit. (Note that starting value â‰  property price)
Properties can get damaged through various ways (this is indicated by the property turning red). When that happens, you need to pay a price to repair them. You can wait as long as you want, but do note that a property's value can't increase when damaged and you can't sell a property when it's damaged.

12.title: Tip
12.description: The chance of the company allowing you to be on their billboards is equal to their reputation. Whenever there is a chance a company does a good deed, you should always check their reputation.<hr>Click the company's name (highlighted in blue) to see the information about the company.
